content: drops design pattern no w-478 yarn group c+c+c or f -------------------------------------------------------- measurements diameter approx 80 cm / 31½ carpet can be worked larger by repeating the stripes in rounds 4-18 materials drops paris from garnstudio 250 g color no 30 denim blue 100 g color no 11 opal green 300 g color no 17 off white 100 g color no 07 heather 150 g color no 01 apricot drops crochet hook size 8 mm / l/11 or size needed to get 8 double_crochet in width and 4 5 double_crochet vertically with 3 strands paris = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4
